overview:
Cheyenne J. Ehrlich is a founder of Perceptual Networks. He is responsible for the strategic growth of the company, including corporate and business development and oversees the companyâ€™s marketing and jointly oversees product development.

Mr. Ehrlich was previously the founder of several technology companies, including Clickthebutton, Link Relay Communications, MyBetterPC, Specialty Retail Shops and others. In these capacities, Mr. Ehrlich has raised tens of millions of dollars in capital, built businesses from launch to more than 30 million users (twice) and has developed co-branded or private labeled products for numerous well-known brands, including Intuit, AOL, eBay and others. Mr. Ehrlich has a degree in computer science from Vassar College.
